ygData.subject: Re: the soerbaird - question and or sick of hearing about it
ygData.msgSnippet: Man , you guys should be lawyers, not bards..... first, one group attacks the other group, then the other group attacks back and refutes what the first group
ygData.messageBody:
Man , you guys should be lawyers, not bards..... first, one group attacks
the other group, then the other group attacks back and refutes what the
first group said. Come on people, jeez can't we all just get along? Who
cares what the soerbaird do or don't do, that is there biz and does nothing
to reflect on you. And to the soerbaird, So what if someone rags on your
group, your a wellknown guild and people are gonna take potshots sometimes.
I'm gonna get lots of flames but can you PLEASE get over your differences?
IT IS A GAME!

Regretfully sorry if I offend,
Talonstar, wandering minstral of E'ci
